meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Life</kanji> in Japan was <kanji>increasing</kanji> at its fastest rate during the <vocabulary>Yayoi Period</vocabulary>. It's one of the earliest periods of history in Japan that we know about! You should look it up, if you don't already know about it.
readingMnemonic: The reading for this word is an exception but it's the same in Japanese as it is in English. So if you just remember it's <reading>Yayoi</reading> (やよい) in English, you'll remember the Japanese too!
